text: The Stolen Jewels is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Stolen JewelsRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Harry Solter, Florence Lawrence, and Linda Arvidson. ==Actors== * Harry Solter as Mr. Jenkins * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Jenkins * Linda Arvidson as The Nurse * John R. Cumpson as Smithson / Man at Broker's * Gladys Egan as Child * George Gebhardt as The Detective / The Mover * D. W. Griffith as Crowd Member at Exchange * Charles Inslee as Man at Brokers ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Stolen Jewels (1908 movie)
